thread.title: What a little gem
thread.title_full: What a little gem - Review of Wolcott Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mand33
title: What a little gem
text:
Lovely hotel in a great location. It's like stepping back in time, spotlessly clean and quite historic. I can only imagine what this hotel was like back in 1902 when it was built.
Location was great, walk out of the hotel, turn right, straight onto 5th Ave, look left and see the Flat Iron building, walk right and see the entrance to the Empire State building.
Hotel staff were also great, especially when I had to call a Dr for my mother who was taken ill during the night. Would highly recommend this hotel and would also stay here again.
Room Tip: They cater for groups of 3, with 3 single beds See more room tips
